Package com.mesosphere.sdk.offer.evaluate

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    OfferEvaluationStage
    Classes implementing this interface evaluate a pod against an offer and its resources for suitability to run.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ExecutorEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given OfferRequirement, ensuring that executor IDs match between the two and setting the executor ID for a newly-launching pod.
    LaunchEvaluationStage
    This class sets pod metadata on a org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfo in an OfferRequirement, ensuring that this metadata is available in the task's environment and creating an LaunchOfferRecommendation.
    NamedVIPEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given OfferRequirement for port resources as in PortEvaluationStage, additionally setting org.apache.mesos.Protos.DiscoveryInfo properly for DC/OS to pick up the specified named VIP mapping.
    OfferEvaluator
    The OfferEvaluator processes Offers and produces OfferRecommendations.
    PlacementRuleEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given OfferRequirement, ensuring that its resources meet the constraints imposed by the supplied PlacementRule.
    PortEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer for its port resources against an OfferRequirement, finding ports dynamically in the offer where specified by the framework and modifying org.apache.mesos.Protos.TaskInfo and org.apache.mesos.Protos.ExecutorInfo where appropriate so that the ports are available in their respective environments.
    ReservationEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer for remaining reserved resources in the offer that have only been partially claimed by the given OfferRequirement, and creates an UnreserveOfferRecommendation for each so that they are freed for general consumption.
    ResourceEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given OfferRequirement, ensuring that it contains a sufficient amount or value of the supplied Resource, and creating a ReserveOfferRecommendation or UnreserveOfferRecommendation where necessary.
    VolumeEvaluationStage
    This class evaluates an offer against a given OfferRequirement, ensuring that it contains an appropriately-sized volume, and creating any necessary instances of ReserveOfferRecommendation and CreateOfferRecommendation as necessary.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    OfferEvaluationException
    Exception for errors encountered during the offer evaluation process.
